altername_name: The Honto ni Atama o Tsukau Action: Dead Head Fred
name: Dead Head Fred
overview: Fred Neuman was just your average Private Investigator until he got a little too close to the shady dealings of a powerful mob boss. Now Fred finds himself without his memory, without his friends and, most disturbingly, without his head - left with only a brain, two eyes and a jar to preserve them. It's from this point that his journey of revenge begins. • Explore the city of Hope Falls, a bizarre and mysterious place where danger lurks around every corner • Use your head as a weapon! Take out your enemies using one of nine unique heads • Assume the powers of your enemies to wreak even more carnage
